message: Let's split the money 60/40. I believe this is a fair offer considering I'm affected by inflation.
Considering the inflation affects you, I'll take a bit more. This is my fair offer.
Bob, I understand you want a good deal, but the inflation is really hurting me.  This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm willing to take a bit more. Inflation isn't affecting me, so I have the upper hand.
